examples:

Refund request reason: I am not able to afford the membership due I'm not working now.
That money I'm using now for food and I would like to get a refund from it.

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot I had active the free trial but I'm planning on using the service so I'll like to request a refund asap thank u

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried the free trial and before the free trial was finished, I cancelled it. However, I have been charged with 107.88€.

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I was getting charged after a free trial. I wasnt ready to pay and I was going to use that money for something else.

Factura nr.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I never intended to make a yearly subscription at Canva, but the Adora Christi Church account was charged and paid 119,40 USD. I am the pastor of this church and I would like to cancel this subscription and I ask you to send the money back for the bill Factura nr. <NUMBER>.
Thank you for your help!
Florin Vasiliu

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, I ask for a refund. I am a student and I do not realize I have signed up for a Canva Pro membership. 1. I don't need them and 2. I can't afford them. I ask you to cancel the subscription so that I do not incur any costs. Kind regards Ana Fink Barra

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not receive any notification regarding the charge or the free trial ending. I did not authorize the charge.

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, 

I will not require this service, which was automatically renewed yesterday. I appreciate your immediate refund of my money.

Thank you.

Nataly Camacho

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: There was a mistake with the subscription, I didnt mean to pay that amount, sorry there was a misunderstanding on my side,  i cannot afford that amount now, and I  have not enough founds at the moment,  a problem with the bank,  because it´s an overdrawn. 
I apologize for the inconvenience, but i will have to suspend the present subscription for the moment.
Please be so kind to do a refund. The transaction was made today, without me noticing. 
Looking forwasrd to your action. Thanks!

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I would like to request the refund of this bill please. I haven’t used any of the services Canva Pro offers, I accidentally suscribed to this but never wanted this service. I’ve already cancelled my subscription. My work is not related with any of the services Canva offers so please I request a refund to be done against my credit card. Appreciate your prompt response

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My daughter used the free canvas period to do a job, she entered my credit card details without my authorization and forgot to cancel the subscription and I can't pay it. I need a refund of my money immediately please.

Factura nr.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I'm sorry I didn't want to subscribe to your services, and I don't know why you billed me, I'd like you to return my money

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I received an email telling me that I would get the refund and I haven't got anything back.  Can someone hlep me please?

Thanks,

<NAME> V

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up on 4th Janaury, and today 3rd February I was charged for one month. I am not interested in using the app for now, i cannot afford it. Please, I beg you to refoun the 12.95. I was not able to decline my promo suscription before since I had low connectivity.
I appreciate your understanding. I am sorry for any inconveniences.

Refund request reason: I did not want to subscribe to this service. I do not need to use it.

Nro. de factura: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t subscribe to the pro trial or anything.

Refund request reason:

Would u please get me a refund I cnt afford to pay that much right now being a single mom trying to survive thank you

Refund request reason:
